AT.name: Alphadia
AT.description: Setze die Energi-Fähigkeiten frei und stürze dich in rundenbasierte Kämpfe in einem epischen JRPG, das das Beste der Klassiker wieder aufleben lässt! Seit dem Ende des Energi-Kriegs ist fast ein Jahrhundert vergangen. Trotz des unterzeichneten Waffenstillstandsabkommens zwischen den verfeindeten Parteien strebt das Schwarzschild-Imperium erneut die Weltherrschaft an und erobert und besetzt eine Nation nach der anderen. Währenddessen retten Ash und Karim, zwei Bewohner einer kleinen Frontstadt, eine junge Frau und ihre Eskorte, die von feindlichen Soldaten verfolgt werden. Aber wer ist dieses mysteriöse Mädchen und welches Schicksal erwartet Ash und seine Begleiter beim Versuch, ihre Mission zu erfüllen...? Mit seinem klassischen RPG-Stil und der Verwendung eines bewährten, rundenbasierten Kampfsystems erweckt Alphadia Gefühle von Nostalgie. Außerdem machen die ausgeklügelte Spielbalance und die einfach zu bedienende Oberfläche das Spiel zugänglich für Spieler jedes Levels und es bietet gleichzeitig mehr als 30 Stunden Spielspaß. Erlebe Alphadia mit eigenen Augen und werde Zeuge seiner dramatischen Geschichte!

AU.name: Alphadia
AU.description: Unleash the energi skills and engage in turn-based battles in an epic JRPG that harks back to the best in classic gaming! It has been almost a century since the end of the Energi War. Yet despite the armistice agreement signed between opposing sides, the Schwarzschild Empire has once again begun plotting world domination as it starts to conquer and occupy one nation after another. It is during this time that Ash and Karim, two residents of a small town on the frontier, rescue a young woman and her escort as they are being pursued by foreign soldiers. But who is this mysterious girl and what fate is in store for Ash and those with him as they attempt to help her fulfill her mission...? Employing an orthodox turn-based battle system, Alphadia evokes a feeling of nostalgia with its classic RPG style. In addition, its refined game balance and simple to use interface make this game accessible to players of any skill level while at the same time offering 30+ hours of gameplay. Come experience Alphadia and witness its dramatic story unfold!

BG.name: Alphadia
BG.description: Unleash the energi skills and engage in turn-based battles in an epic JRPG that harks back to the best in classic gaming! It has been almost a century since the end of the Energi War. In addition, its refined game balance and simple to use interface make this game accessible to players of any skill level while at the same time offering 30+ hours of gameplay. Come experience Alphadia and witness its dramatic story unfold!

BE.name: Alphadia
BE.description: Libérez votre énergie et engagez-vous dans des combats au tour par tour dans un RPG mythique qui rappelle les meilleurs classiques des jeux du genre! Près d'un siècle s'est écoulé depuis la fin de la Guerre de l'Energi. Malgré la signature d'un armistice entre les camps opposés, l'Empire Schwarzschild met à exécution son nouveau plan de conquête du monde en commençant déjà à conquérir pays après pays. C'est à ce moment que Karim et Ash, deux habitants d'un petit village situé sur la frontière, viennent au secours d'une jeune femme et de son escorte alors qu'ils sont poursuivis par des soldats étrangers. Qui est donc cette mystérieuse femme, et quel destin attend Ash et ses compagnons qui vont tenter de l'aider à remplir sa mission...? Alphadia vous rappellera avec nostalgie les grands classiques RPG avec son système de combats au tour par tour. De plus, l'interface du jeu simple à utiliser le rend accessible à tout type de joueur et offre un gameplay de plus de 30 heures. Vivez l'expérience Alphadia et découvrez cette histoire incroyable au fur et à mesure de son déroulement!

ES.name: Alphadia
ES.description: Suelta la magia energi y participa en una épica aventura ofrecida por un JRPG que remonta a lo mejor en estilo clásico! Ha pasado un siglo desde el fin de la impetuosa guerra Energi. Sin embargo, a pesar de estar en un periodo de paz, el Imperio Schwarzsilt empieza a tramar el dominio del mundo comenzando a invadir y conquistar un país detrás de otro. Durante este periodo Ash y Karim, dos residentes de Heiland, un pueblo de la frontera, salvan a una chica y su acompañante mientras estaban siendo perseguidos en el bosque por un grupo de soldados extranjeros. ¿Quién será esta chica misteriosa? ¿A qué se enfrentaran Ash y sus compañeros tratando de ayudarla en su misión... ? Por medio de un sistema ortodoxo de combate a turnos, Alphadia nos evoca la emoción y la nostalgia de aquellos juegos de estilo clásico. Además, el equilibrio refinado y la sencillez de uso del interface hacen este juego fácil para todos, ofreciendo al rededor de 30 horas de diversión. Ven a experimentar Alphadia y hazte cómplice de una hisotria fantástica!

IT.name: Alphadia
IT.description: Vivi un JRPG epico classico, caratterizzato da combattimenti a turni e dallo scatenarsi di magie Energi! E' passato un secolo dalla fine della furiosissima guerra Energi. Nonostante ciò, durante il periodo di pace, l'Impero Schwarzschild inizia a complottare per il dominio del mondo cominciando ad invadere e conquistare un popolo dopo l'altro. E' proprio durante questo periodo che Ash e Karim, due abitanti dii Heiland, una cittadina di frontiera, salvano una ragazza e la sua scorta nel bosco mentre erano inseguiti da un gruppo di soldati stranieri. Chi è questa ragazza misteriosa? Quale destino dovranno affrontare Ash e i suoi compagni aiutando la missione di questa ragazza... ? Scoprilo attraverso questa storia drammatica che non aspetta altro che coinvolgerti! Attraverso un sistema ortodosso di combattimento a turni, Alphadia evoca l’emozione e la nostalgia dei giochi di stile classico. Inoltre, l'equilibrio raffinato e la semplicità di uso dell'interfaccia ne fanno un gioco facile per chiunque. Vieni a provare Alphadia e assisti come la storia si svolge drammaticamente!

PT.name: Alphadia
PT.description: Desperte as habilidades energi e trave batalhas em turnos em um épico JRPG inspirado nos melhores jogos do gênero! Quase um século se passou desde o fim da Guerra de Energi. Mas a despeito do armistício assinado entre as partes antagônicas, o Império dos Schwarzschild mais uma vez inicia seu plano de dominação mundial e conquista nação após nação. É nesta época que Ash e Karim, dois habitantes de uma pequena cidade na fronteira, resgatam uma jovem donzela e seu escoltador que estavam sendo perseguidos por soldados estrangeiros. Mas quem é esta misteriosa garota e qual destino se prepara para Ash e os seus aliados ao tentar ajudá-la a completar sua missão? Empregando um original sistema de batalha em turnos, Alphadia evoca nostalgia com o seu estilo clássico de RPG. Além disto, o jogo é balanceado com muito refino, e sua interface simples o torna acessível para qualquer um enquanto oferece cerca de 30 horas de jogo. Venha experimentar Alphadia e testemunhe sua dramática história se desdobrar.

RU.name: Alphadia
RU.description: Эпическая jRPG, отсылающая к классике жанра, с пошаговыми сражениями и уникальными Навыками Энерги. Почти столетие минуло со времён Войн Энерги. Игнорируя договор о перемирии, империя Шварцсчайлд начинает захват земель соседних стран, преследуя цель мирового господства. Тем временем Аш и Карим, двое друзей из небольшого пограничного городка, спасают молодую женщину и её эскорт, преследуемых иностранными солдатами. Какая судьба ожидает теперь Аша и компанию, пытающихся помочь таинственной незнакомке с её миссией? Альфадия, использующая пошаговую систему сражений старой закалки, взывает к чувству ностальгии поклонников классических RPG. Отточенный игровой баланс вкупе с простым интерфейсом делают игру доступной для аудитории любого уровня, предлагая в то же время более 30 часов приключений. Погрузитесь в драматический сюжет мира Альфадии!

SE.name: Alphadia
SE.description: Unleash the energi skills and engage in turn-based battles in an epic JRPG that harks back to the best in classic gaming! It has been almost a century since the end of the Energi War. Yet despite the armistice agreement signed between opposing sides, the Schwarzschild Empire has once again begun plotting world domination as it starts to conquer and occupy one nation after another. It is during this time that Ash and Karim, two residents of a small town on the frontier, rescue a young woman and her escort as they are being pursued by foreign soldiers. But who is this mysterious girl and what fate is in store for Ash and those with him as they attempt to help her fulfill her mission...? Employing an orthodox turn-based battle system, Alphadia evokes a feeling of nostalgia with its classic RPG style. In addition, its refined game balance and simple to use interface make this game accessible to players of any skill level while at the same time offering 30+ hours of gameplay. Come experience Alphadia and witness its dramatic story unfold!
